messages.title: My vow is to make Scotland stronger at Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: World-class childcare and much-needed cash for public services, not wasting £100-billion on new nuclear weapons.
Additional investment in Scotland's NHS - its budget protected and its future safe in public hands.
Security in retirement, with better pensions and ongoing benefits such as free bus travel and free personal care.
A more responsible economic policy, one which boosts long-term growth, creates jobs, and delivers for all.
Fresh thinking and new ideas for Westminster, and the guarantors of progressive policies like free education and the living wage.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The more seats the SNP wins the more influence and power the people of Scotland will have.

quotes.text: We will play a constructive role with new ideas and fresh thinking.

images.caption: My vow is to make Scotland stronger at Westminster.
We will play a constructive role with new ideas and fresh thinking.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Presented by (name) on behalf of the Scottish National Party, both at (address).
